name: Two Letterpress Card (Collaboration with Lovely In The Home Press)
description:
This limited edition letterpress card represents a collaboration between Primrose Press and Lovely In The Home Press. 

LITH hand-inked and printed the large number two background using wood type on an antique press in New Hampshire; Primrose Press wrote the text and printed the foreground on an antique printing press in Washington, DC. Due to the nature of hand-inking and printing, there are slight variations between cards. 

to you
to love 
my love


Card Size: 5.5" x 4.25" Folded
Paper: 100% cotton
Paper Color: white
Ink Color: shades of navy blue, silvery turquoise
Envelope: 100% cotton
Envelope Color: white 
Front message: see above
Inside: blank

Price includes envelope. Card and envelope ship in a protective, cellophane cover.

All products are copyright protected.
©2010 Primrose Press and Lovely In The Home Press

name: Happy New Year Letterpress Card
description:
Happy New Year Letterpress Card

2011 is just around the corner. Wow, 2010 just flew by. Why not ring in the new year with a bundle of primroses.

Card Size: 4.25" x 5.5" Folded
Paper: 100% cotton
Paper Color: white
Ink Color: Silvery purple
Envelope: is made from 30% post-consumer recycled fiber
Envelope Color: silver, gold, green, blue, or red (let me pick a color for you)
Front message: Happy New Year
Inside: blank

Price includes envelope.Card and envelope ship in a protective, cellophane cover.

All products are copyright protected.
©2010 Primrose Press

name: Blues Letterpress Card (Collaboration with Dave Eggar)
description:
In honor of Black History Month, Primrose Press celebrates Blues Music- that oh so American music form that simultaneously breaks your heart and builds you up. This limited edition, letterpress card represents the collaboration of Primrose Press with Grammy-nominated musician/composer Dave Eggar. Check out his Grammy-nominated album, Kingston Morning.


Dave Eggar wrote the principal text (see below). Primrose Press designed the background, set and printed the piece on an antique press. It took five separate passes through the press to complete this card. 

The sales proceeds will be donated to the Blues Foundation's Hart Fund, which provides financial assistance to ailing blues musicians. 


The Blues inhale resilience, rhythm
And grace.
Tumbling out Delta sorrow to holler the world's tears.
Her exhale frosts hope in human shadows
just slightly to the left of blue.

- Dave Eggar


Card Size: 5.5" x 4.25" Folded
Paper: 100% cotton
Paper Color: white
Ink Color: Brown and multiple shades of blue 
Envelope: 100% cotton
Envelope Color: white 
Front message: see above
Inside: blank

Price includes envelope. Card and envelope ship in a protective, cellophane cover.

All products are copyright protected.
©2010 Primrose Press and Dave Eggar
